title: Introducing: SinceYou
body:
Boston/LA quartet **SinceYou** have seemingly appeared out of nowhere, with their stunning debut EP, simply titled I.

Put onto my radar by CitR contributor Ian (aka [The Unloved Kids](http://blog.theunlovedkids.com/2014/04/17/trust-me-i-dont-know/)), it’s perfectly formed, R&B indebted indie. Comparison wise, there’s elements of Aussie outfit **Tora**, and perhaps even LA hip-pop giants **The Neighbourhood**. From the stunning EP opener _Barefoot_, to the **Ava Trilling** featuring _Lela Bells_, it’s one of the most exciting debut EP’s of 2014. Stream it in full below.
